Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Group-control has been enabled in the nipper. The following properties should be adjusted/set in order to make this function properly:\\n- \\"nip:trait:group:categories\\"\\n--- This property contains a string array of categories which will be used to determine the groups this NPC belong to, in order (left to right, strongest to weakest).\\n- \\"nip:trait:group:faction\\"\\n--- This is a string property which decides the faction this NPC belongs to. NO GROUP will ever include an NPC from a different faction. ALL NPC's in a group are always of the same faction. Thus, 'the evil dudes' will never become a group with 'the good lads', NPC wise."
